bio: Interact with a DApp to rate it. Address usage ensures genuine ratings.
impactDescription: DApps Rating Platform: Only users who have interacted with a specific DApp can rate it. Users must log in with an ETH address. Users can evaluate a project only if there is activity associated with their address and the relevant contract addresses. This system ensures that only genuine users can rate DApps, contributing to a more secure Optimism ecosystem, which aligns with broader adoption.

Users can evaluate a project only if there is activity associated with their address and the relevant contract addresses. reportReason: Not sure from their application if this has any impact
